name: Sub Sim
description:
Explore a variety of ship wrecks while relaxing to peaceful music.

Command your submarine around different styles of ship wrecks, deep under water.

Look out of your submarine, and view it from external cameras, illuminating your submersibles spotlights on the wrecks as you maneuver around them.

You decide where you go, with no time limits, simply relax, take the controls, and go exploring!


All future ship wrecks are included!

This version gives you 4 ships to explore;

Oil Tanker
Galleon
Fishing Boat
Car Ferry (Zenobia) - lots of detail (takes time to load)

A lot of time was put in to getting the right music, so relax, and enjoy time underwater!
